name: Webert Sicot
description: '''Webert Sicot''' (1930 – February 1985) was a [[Haiti]]an saxophone player, composer and band leader. He is recognized as one of the creators of ''[[compas]]'' also known as ''compas direct'', a style of Haitian music born in the 1950s that he named [[cadence rampa]] after he left Nemours' band to differentiate himself in 1962 in the spirit of competition.
